long_description: The women's Terry Flare Bike Skort adds fun to your ride. The swingy skirt features attached liner shorts underneath, complete with a comfort chamois. Stretchy polyester/spandex skirt and attached liner shorts wick moisture and dry quickly to keep you comfortable in warm weather. Wide waistband pulls on easily. Invisible zippered pocket stows small items. Liner shorts sport a women-specific chamois pad for comfort as you ride. Terry Flare Bike Skort features contrast trim at hem and waistband.
short_description: The women's Terry Flare Bike Skort adds fun to your ride. The swingy skirt features attached liner shorts underneath, complete with a comfort chamois.
